description:
From energizing white, to a relaxing warm glow, the Alpenglow 500’s multicolour LEDs have the right light for the moment. When its time for a change, simply give the lantern a shake to cycle through the colours. You can also use the USB port to top up your other electronics.

  • White and colour LEDs
  • Lighting modes: high (4.5 hours), low (48 hours), cool, warm, 1 colour, multicolour (steady or party)
  • Dimmable light lets you dial in brightness
  • Single button or shake of the lantern will cycle you though modes
  • Dual sided design lights up 1 side or both
  • LED power indicator shows charging progress and battery status
  • 1 USB port (type A) for powering other devices
  • Internal 6000mAh battery recharges via micro USB
  • Dimensions: 13.6 x 9.7cm
  • Folding hook on the bottom for hanging the lantern
name: BioLite Alpenglow 500 Lantern
